title: Spatial analysis of leachate penetration at Lemna dumpsite, Calabar: Implications for sustainable waste management in Cross River State
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): E.I. Igelle, P.O. Phil-Eze, O.O. Akim, H.I. Kanu, I.C. Ekowk, J.W. Atsa, P.A. Ojugbo, J.S. Okputu, Kamal Abdelrahman, S.E. Ekwok, P. Andráš, Ahmed M. Eldosouky
